doc:
Howard Caine https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Howard_Caine 0 Howard Caine (born Howard Cohen; January 2, 1926 – December 28, 1993) was an American character actor, probably best known as Gestapo Major, Wolfgang Hochstetter in the television series Hogan's Heroes (1965–71). He also played Lewis Morris of New York in the musical film 1776, and Everett Scovill, a thinly disguised portrait of Charles Manson's attorney Irving Kanarek, in the television movie, Helter Skelter. Howard_Caine ( born Howard_Cohen ; January_2_,_1926 – December_28_,_1993 ) was an_American_character_actor , probably best_known as Gestapo_Major , Wolfgang_Hochstetter in the_television_series_Hogan 's_Heroes ( 1965 – 71 ) . He also played Lewis_Morris of New_York in the_musical_film_1776 , and Everett_Scovill , a_thinly_disguised_portrait of Charles_Manson 's_attorney_Irving_Kanarek , in the_television_movie , Helter_Skelter .
